channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- HiRouter-CD20, WS5200-10
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- HiRouter-CD20, WS5200-10

item.title: CVE-2018-7937|2024-08-05T06:37:59.688Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- hirouter-cd20%2C%20ws5200-10
item.description: In Huawei HiRouter-CD20-10 with the versions before 1.9.6 and WS5200-10 with the versions before 1.9.6, there is a plug-in signature bypass vulnerability due to insufficient plug-in verification. An attacker may tamper with a legitimate plug-in to build a malicious plug-in and trick users into installing it. Successful exploit could allow the attacker to obtain the root permission of the device and take full control over the device.
